00016 Simulation::Simulation(const char * NetworkFile, const char * WeightsFile, double SimulationTime, double NewSimulationStep) throw (EDLUTException): Net(0), Queue(0), InputSpike(), OutputSpike(), OutputWeight(), Totsimtime(SimulationTime), SimulationStep(NewSimulationStep), SaveWeightStep(0), EndOfSimulation(false), Updates(0), Heapoc(0){
00017         Queue = new EventQueue();
00018         Net = new Network(NetworkFile, WeightsFile, this->Queue);
00019 }

00047 void Simulation::RunSimulation()  throw (EDLUTException){
00048         this->CurrentSimulationTime = 0.0;
00049         
00050         // Get the external initial inputs
00051         this->GetInput();
00052         
00053         // Add a final simulation event
00054         this->Queue->InsertEvent(new EndSimulationEvent(this->Totsimtime));
00055         
00056         // Add the first save weight event
00057         if (this->SaveWeightStep>0.0F){
00058                 this->Queue->InsertEvent(new SaveWeightsEvent(this->SaveWeightStep));   
00059         }
00060         
00061         // Add the first communication event
00062         if (this->SimulationStep>0.0F){
00063                 this->Queue->InsertEvent(new CommunicationEvent(this->SimulationStep));         
00064         }       
00065         
00066         while(!this->EndOfSimulation){
00067                 Event * NewEvent;
00068                 
00069                 NewEvent=this->Queue->RemoveEvent();
00070                         
00071                 if(NewEvent->GetTime() == -1){
00072                         break;
00073                 }
00074                 
00075                 Updates++;
00076                 Heapoc+=Queue->Size();
00077                         
00078                 if(NewEvent->GetTime() - this->CurrentSimulationTime < -0.0001){
00079                         cerr << "Internal error: Bad spike time. Spike: " << NewEvent->GetTime() << " Current: " << this->CurrentSimulationTime << endl;
00080                 }
00081                         
00082                 this->CurrentSimulationTime=NewEvent->GetTime(); // only for checking
00083 
00084                 NewEvent->ProcessEvent(this);
00085                 
00086                 delete NewEvent;
00087         }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void Simulation::WriteSpike(const Spike * spike){
00091         Neuron * neuron=spike->GetSource();  // source of the spike
00092     
00093     if(neuron->IsMonitored()){
00094                 for (list<OutputSpikeDriver *>::iterator it=this->MonitorSpike.begin(); it!=this->MonitorSpike.end(); ++it){
00095                         (*it)->WriteSpike(spike);
00096                 }
00097         }
00098                 
00099         if(neuron->IsOutput()){
00100                 for (list<OutputSpikeDriver *>::iterator it=this->OutputSpike.begin(); it!=this->OutputSpike.end(); ++it){
00101                         (*it)->WriteSpike(spike);
00102                 }
00103         }               
00104 }
00105 
00106 void Simulation::WritePotential(float time, Neuron * neuron, float value){
00107         if(neuron->IsMonitored()){
00108                 for (list<OutputSpikeDriver *>::iterator it=this->MonitorSpike.begin(); it!=this->MonitorSpike.end(); ++it){
00109                         if ((*it)->IsWritePotentialCapable()){
00110                                 (*it)->WritePotential(time, neuron, value);
00111                         }
00112                 }
00113         }
00114                 
00115         if(neuron->IsOutput()){
00116                 for (list<OutputSpikeDriver *>::iterator it=this->OutputSpike.begin(); it!=this->OutputSpike.end(); ++it){
00117                         if ((*it)->IsWritePotentialCapable()){
00118                                 (*it)->WritePotential(time, neuron, value);
00119                         }
00120                 }
00121         }               
00122 }

00124 void Simulation::SaveWeights(){
00125         cout << "Saving weights in time " << this->CurrentSimulationTime << endl;
00126         for (list<OutputWeightDriver *>::iterator it=this->OutputWeight.begin(); it!=this->OutputWeight.end(); ++it){
00127                 (*it)->WriteWeights(this->Net,this->CurrentSimulationTime);
00128         }
00129         
00130 }
00131 
00132 void Simulation::SendOutput(){
00133         cout << "Sending outputs in time " << this->CurrentSimulationTime << endl;
00134         for (list<OutputSpikeDriver *>::iterator it=this->OutputSpike.begin(); it!=this->OutputSpike.end(); ++it){
00135                 if ((*it)->IsBuffered()){
00136                         (*it)->FlushBuffers();  
00137                 }
00138         }
00139 }
00140 
00141 void Simulation::GetInput(){
00142         cout << "Getting inputs in time " << this->CurrentSimulationTime << endl;
00143         for (list<InputSpikeDriver *>::iterator it=this->InputSpike.begin(); it!=this->InputSpike.end(); ++it){
00144                 if (!(*it)->IsFinished()){
00145                         (*it)->LoadInputs(this->Queue, this->Net);
00146                 }
00147         }
00148 }
